tier.item: 'I don't read books...(I just buy them...)'
'I don't read books...(I just buy them...)'
I don't read books...(I just buy them...)
(16) a. *Ég boraði þetta grænmetii ekki/aldrei ti [án þess að sjóða ei]
I eat this vegetable not/never without cooking

(20) a. Ali bir piyano-yu kiralamak istiyor (Turkish)
'Ali wants to rent a certain piano.'
(20) a. Ali bir piyano-yu kiralamak istiyor (Turkish)
'Ali wants to rent a certain piano.'
Ali wants to rent a certain piano.
b. Ali bir piyano kiralamak istiyor
b. Ali bir piyano kiralamak istiyor
Ali wants to rent a (non-specific) piano.
(21) a. Robin-wa Tokyo-kara Chiba-made-no 10 mairu-o hasit-ta
'Robin ran (the) 10 miles between Tokyo and Chiba.'

'Robin ran (the) 10 miles between Tokyo and Chiba.'
Robin ran (the) 10 miles between Tokyo and Chiba.
'What cowboys do with tobacco is: they chew it.'

(23) a. Ben dün aks m [VPçok güzel bir biftek yedim] (Turkish)
I yesterday evening very nice a steak ate
'Yesterday evening, I ate a very nice steak.'

(31) a. La oían a Paca/la niña/la gata. (Porteño Spanish)
(31) a. La oían a Paca/la niña/la gata. (Porteño Spanish)
La oían a Paca/la niña/la gata.
They listened to Paca/the girl/the cat.
